key_mistakes.reason: Develops the knight to a less optimal square early in the game.
Premature castling; leaves the king vulnerable.
Misses a better capture option that maintains material balance.

recommendations: Focus on maintaining king safety by avoiding unnecessary pawn moves around the king.
Develop pieces to optimal squares according to opening principles.
Identify and capitalize on tactical opportunities, especially in the middle game.
Ensure pawn captures maintain structure and activity, particularly in the center.
